lines.text: Isn't that - water up ahead?
No. This is a desert. And that's a mirage.

[later, walking through the flooded plain]
How much longer you think this mirage is gonna last?
[Trying to steal Allison's car]
Where the hell's the clutch?
It's automatic!
Get in, you're driving.
So, what did you think of 1984?
Television was great.
You didn't see enough of it.
You know, I got it all figured out... Navy owes me 40 years back pay.
Why'd you join the Navy?
girl in every port.

[to transvestite]
What the hell are you dressed like that for?
We've all got problems, honey. But we don't solve 'em with guns.

This now, this time, it's not ours. We weren't here when it happened. The experiment took place on a ship in a Philadelphia harbor. It was - 1943, October. Does this sound... crazy? You know, or is this sort of thing possible now?
Whew. What is *that*?
Oh, I think it's a Porsche.
Now that's *really* neat.
What the hell have you done, Longstreet?
Hey, there goes the whiz kid.
Doesn't look too happy, does he?
Maybe he knows somethin' we don't.
Thanks, David, that's just what I wanted to hear.

[sees President Ronald Reagan giving a speech on television]
Hey, I know this guy. Is this another movie?

[smiles]
No, David, it's not another movie.
